sentences: Siiani pole olnud mahti hirmule mõelda.
Veel siiani kostab kõrvus see räme hääl.
Arvasin siiani, et sinu meelerahu ei kõiguta miski.
context: The Estonian word 'siiani' is an adverb that means 'until now', 'so far', or 'up to this point'. It indicates time up to the present moment. It can be used in various contexts referring to past experiences, situations continuing into the present, or actions that have been happening until this very day.
